ISSUE.TITLE: Shortcode only works once
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION:
### To Reproduce 1. Create a test shortcode ```[lorem]``` that just replaces itself with ```lorem ipsum ...``` 2. Create some content with a HTML body and use that shortcode more than once. Something like: ```

Here is [lorem]

And some more [lorem]

And even more [lorem]

``` ### Expected behavior In the final content all the [lorem] shortcodes will be replaced. ### Actual Only the first [lorem] is transformed. If there are two different shortcodes and more then one of each, then only the first of both will be rendered correctly.

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Fixes Notifier rendering only one message (#8931)
